original: tatra ca kāvyaviśeṣatvarūpaṃ dhvanitvannāstītyato dhvaneḥ na padaprakāśatvaṃ,
analyzed: tatra ca kāvya viśeṣa tva rūpam dhvani tvat na asti iti atas dhvaneḥ na pada prakāśa tvam
kintu vākya prakāśa tvam eva sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: anena granthena padanna dhvaniprakāśakamavācakatvādityarthaḥ phalita ityabhipretya 'syādeṣadoṣa' ityādisamādhānagranthamavatārayati locane---avācakatvādityādi
analyzed: anena granthena padan na dhvani prakāśakam avācaka tvāt iti arthaḥ phalitaḥ iti abhipretya syāt eṣa doṣaḥ ityādi samādhāna grantham avatārayati locane avācaka tvāt ityādi
aprayojakaḥ iti
yadi vācaka tvam prayojakam dhvani vyavahāre syāt
na tu evam tasya vyañjaka tvena vyavasthānāt

original: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇāmiva saṃsthānavaśeṣāvacchinnasamudāyasādhyāpi cārutvapratītiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
analyzed: kim ca kāvyānām śarīrāṇām iva saṃsthāna vaśeṣa avacchinna samudāya sādhyā api cāru tva pratītiḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām

original: bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānāmapi vyañjakatvamukhena vyavasthito dhvanivyavahāro na virodhi /
analyzed: bhāgeṣu kalpyate iti padānām api vyañjaka tva mukhena vyavasthitaḥ dhvani vyavahāraḥ na virodhi
locanam vastu vṛttena api pariharati kim ca iti

original: yadi paro brūyāt---na mayā avācakatvaṃ dhvanyabhāve hetūkṛtaṃ kiṃ tūktaṃ kāvyaṃ dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: yadi paraḥ brūyāt na mayā avācaka tvam dhvani abhāve hetūkṛtam kim tu uktam kāvyam dhvaniḥ

original: kāvyaṃ cānākāṅkṣapratipattikāri vākyaṃ na padamiti tatrāha--satyamevaṃ,
analyzed: kāvyam ca an ākāṅkṣa pratipatti kāri vākyam na padam iti tatra āha satyam evam
tathā api padam na dhvaniḥ iti asmābhiḥ uktam
api tu samudāyaḥ eva

original: tathā ca padaprakāśo dhvaniriti prakāśapadenoktam. nanu padasya tatra tathāvithaṃ sāmarthyamiti kuto 'khaṇḍa eva pratītikrama ityāśaṅkyāha--kāvyānāmiti
analyzed: tathā ca pada prakāśaḥ dhvaniḥ iti prakāśa padena uktam nanu padasya tatra tathāvitham sāmarthyam iti kutas khaṇḍaḥ eva pratīti kramaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha kāvyānām iti
uktam hi prāk viveka kāle vibhāga upadeśaḥ iti

original: nanu bhāgeṣu padarūpeṣu kathaṃ sā cārutvapratītirāropayituṃ śakyā?

analyzed: tatas kim manohāri vyaṅgya artha smāraka tvāt hi cāru tva pratīti nibandhana tvam kena bāla priyāḥ asādhakaḥ iti arthaḥ

rasa bandhe bhiniveśaḥ rasa bandha abhiniveśaḥ atyantam rasa bandha abhiniveśaḥ yaḥ tasya abhāvaḥ

original: tathāhi-'taṭī tāraṃ tāmyati' ityatra taṭaśabdasya puṇṭaśabdasya puṃstvanapuṃsakatve anādṛtya strītvamevāśritaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ 'strīti nāmāpi madhuraṃ'  #

śṛṅgāra kathāyām avatāra varṇane

original: na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye daivavyāmohitatvaṃ kathāpuruṣasya parihāro yato rasabandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye daiva vyāmohita tvam kathā puruṣasya parihāraḥ yatas rasa bandhaḥ eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛtti nibandhanam yuktam

original: itivṛttavarṇanaṃ tadupāya evetyuktaṃ prāk 'ālokārthī yathā dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjanaḥ' ityādinā /
analyzed: iti vṛtta varṇanam tad upāyaḥ eva iti uktam prāk āloka arthī yathā dīpa śikhāyām yatnavān janaḥ ityādinā

original: ata eva cetivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvarahitarasabhāvanibandhena ca kavīnāmevaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādirūpavyaṅgyatātparyamevaiṣāṃ  #
analyzed: atas eva ca iti vṛtta mātra varṇana prādhānye ṅga aṅgi bhāva rahita rasa bhāva nibandhena ca kavīnām evaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavanti iti rasa ādi rūpa vyaṅgya tātparyam eva eṣām
yathāvat sa rājacarite caturthe ṅke ratnāvalī nāmadheyam api a gṛṅṇataḥ vijayavarma vṛttānta varṇane

original: api tāvaditi śabdābhyāṃ duryodhanādestadvarṇanaṃ dūrāpāstamiti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīyāṅkamevodāharaṇatvena dhvanati /
analyzed: api tāvat iti śabdābhyām duryodhana ādeḥ tat varṇanam dūra apāstam iti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīya aṅkam evā udāharaṇa tvena dhvanati
atas eva vakṣyati daiva vyāmohita tvam iti
pūrvam tu sandhi aṅga abhiprāyeṇa pratyudāharaṇam uktam
kathāpuruṣasya iti pratināyakasya iti yāvat
atas eva ca iti

original: yato rasabandha eva mukhyaḥ kavivyāpāraviṣayaḥ itivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye bālapriyā rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvadityatratyābhyāṃ tāmyāmityarthaḥ
analyzed: yatas rasa bandhaḥ eva mukhyaḥ kavi vyāpāra viṣayaḥ iti vṛtta mātra varṇana prādhānye bālapriyā rāmadeva prāyasya api tāvat iti atratyābhyām tāmyām iti arthaḥ
dhvanati iti anena asya sambandhaḥ
tad varṇanam iti

atas eva iti
dvitīya aṅkasya udāharaṇa tvena dhvananāt eva iti arthaḥ
daiva vyāmohita tvam iti

veṇī saṃhāre duryodhanasya tat gamyate iti bhāvaḥ
yathā veṇīsaṃhāre iti pūrvam uktam anya abhiprāyeṇa iti smārayati pūrvam ityādi
kathā puruṣasya iti anena vivakṣitam āha pratināyakasya iti
na tu pradhānanāyakasya iti arthaḥ

yat vā rasa bandhe iti saptamī antam
atas eva iti asya ārabdhaḥ iti anena sambandhaḥ

original: vṛttau prādhānye sati yadibandhanaṃ tasminniti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: vṛttau prādhānye sati tasmin iti sambandhaḥ
yuktam iti smābhiḥ ārabdhaḥ na dhvani pratipādana mātra abhiniveśena

original: punaścāyamanyo rasabhaṅgaheturavadhāraṇīyo yatparipoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥ--punyena dīpanam /
analyzed: punar ca ayam anyaḥ rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ avadhāraṇīyaḥ yat paripoṣam gatasya api rasasya paunaḥpunyena dīpanam

original: ubhayukto hi rasaḥ svasāmagrīlabdhaparipoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlānakusumakalpaḥ kalpate /
analyzed: ubha yuktaḥ hi rasaḥ sva sāmagrī labdha paripoṣaḥ punar punar parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlāna kusuma kalpaḥ kalpate
tathā vṛtteḥ vyavahārasya yat anaucityam tat api rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ eva

original: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāściducitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣakathane /

original: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharataprasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntaraprasiddhānāmupanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yadanaucityamaviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tadapi  #
analyzed: yadi vā vṛttīnām bharata prasiddhānām kaiśikī ādīnām kāvya alaṅkāra antara prasiddhānām upanāgarika ādyānām vā yat anaucityam aviṣaye nibandhanam tat api
rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ

original: evameṣāṃ rasavirodhināmanyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayamutprekṣitānāṃ parihāre satkavibhiravahitairbhavitavyam /

original: nīrasastu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /

original: locanam sati yadaṅgāṅgibhāvarahitānāmavicāritaguṇapradhānabhāvānāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tannimittāni skhalitāni sarve doṣā ityarthaḥ /

original: tau ca vyaṅgyatāyāmapi bhavata eveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tau ca vyaṅgya tāyām api bhavataḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: mukhyatayā ca rasa eva kāvyavākyārtha ityuktam /
analyzed: mukhya tayā ca rasaḥ eva kāvya vākya arthaḥ iti uktam
tena amukhya tayā yatra saḥ ṛthaḥ tatra anūdyamāna tvam rasasya api yuktam
yadi vā anūdyamāna vibhāva ādi samākṣipta tvāt rasasya anūdyamāna tā tat āha vākya arthasya iti
bala priyā yā gauḥ sā aruṇā piṅga akṣī ityādi
spaṣṭam idam mīmāṃsā paribhāṣā ādau
vākyīyaḥ iti
vākya pratipādyaḥ iti arthaḥ
eṣām ityādi
yaḥ āgacchati sa gacchati ityādi pārṣṭhika anvayaḥ iti arthaḥ
viruddha tvāt sa kevalam vighaṭatām iti sambandhaḥ
vṛttau vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ iti
gamana āgamana ādyoḥ atyarthaḥ
anūdyamāna tvena iti
iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ityādi uktam eva vivṛṇoti śloke ityādi
vidhīyamāna tvam iti
prādhānyam iti arthaḥ
na ca ityādi abhyupagamāt iti antam grantham avatārayati locanena nu ityādi
yat vācyam iti
yaḥ vācya arthaḥ iti arthaḥ
tatra vidhiḥ iti
tasya vidhiḥ anuvādaḥ ca iti bhāvaḥ
teṣām ityādi parihāra granthasya bhāvam āha pradhāna ityādi
yuktam ityantena
vidhi anuvādau iti
arthasya iti śeṣaḥ
vyaṅgaya tāyām api vyaṅgya tve sati api
kutra anūdyamāna tvam rasasya iti atra āha mukhya tayā ityādi
saḥ rthaḥ vyaṅgya arthaḥ
yat iva iti pakṣa antara dyotakam
tad ākṣiptānām rasānām kena vāryete
yaiḥ vā sākṣāt kāvya artha tā rasa ādīnām na abhyupagamyate
taiḥ teṣām tad nibhitta tā tāvat avaśyam abhyupagantavyā
tathā api atra śloke na virodhaḥ
yasmāt anūdyamāna aṅga nimitta ubhaya rasa vastu sahakāriṇaḥ vidhīyamāna aṃśāt bhāva viśeṣa pratītiḥ utpadyate tatas ca na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: dṛśyate viruddhobhayasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇātkāryaviśeṣotpattiḥ viruddhaphalotpādanahetutvaṃ hi yugapadekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhayasahakāritvam
analyzed: dṛśyate viruddha ubhaya sahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇāt kārya viśeṣa utpattiḥ viruddha phala utpādana hetu tvam hi yugapad ekasya kāraṇasya viruddham na tu viruddha ubhaya sahakāri tvam

original: locanam yadi vā mā bhūdanūdyamānatayā viruddhayo rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ,
analyzed: locanam yadi vā mā bhūt anūdyamāna tayā viruddhayoḥ rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ

original: sahakāritayā tu bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāviruddhayoryuktiyukto 'ṅgāṅgibhāvo nātra prayāsaḥ kaściditi darśayati--yaivati /
analyzed: sahakāri tayā tu bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā aviruddhayoḥ yukti yuktaḥ ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ na atra prayāsaḥ kaścid iti darśayati yā eva iti
tad nimitta tā iti

original: kāvyārtho vibhāvādirnimittaṃ yeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ te tathā teṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
analyzed: kāvya arthaḥ vibhāva ādiḥ nimittam yeṣām rasa ādīnām te tathā teṣām bhāvaḥ tattā

original: anūdyamānā ye hastakṣepādayo rasāṅgabhūtā vibhāvādayastannimittaṃ yadubhayaṃ karuṇavipralambhātmakaṃ
analyzed: anūdyamānāḥ ye hasta kṣepa ādayaḥ rasa aṅga bhūtāḥ vibhāva ādayaḥ tad nimittam yat ubhayam karuṇa vipralambha ātmakam
rasa vastu rasa sajātīyam tat sahakāri vidhīyamānasya śāmbhava śara vahni janita durit dāha lakṣaṇasya
tasmāt bhāva viśeṣe preyaḥ laṅkāra viṣaye bhagavat prabhāva atiśaya lakṣaṇe pratītiḥ iti saṅgatiḥ

original: viruddhaṃ yadubhayaṃ vāritejogataṃ śītoṣṇaṃ tatsahakāri yasya taṇḍulādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmātkāryaviśeṣasya komalabhaktakaraṇalakṣaṇasyotpattirdṛśyate
analyzed: viruddham yat ubhayam vāri tejaḥ gatam śīta uṣṇam tat sahakāri yasya taṇḍula ādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmāt kārya viśeṣasya komala bhakta karaṇa lakṣaṇasya utpattiḥ dṛśyate
sarvatra hi ittham eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bīja aṅkura ādau na anyathā
nanu virodhaḥ tarhi sarvatra akiñcitkaraḥ syāt iti āśaṅkya āha viruddha phala iti
tathā ca āhuḥ na upādānam viruddhasya iti

original: nanvabhineyārthe kāvye yadīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettadā bālapriyā anvityādi /
analyzed: nanu abhineya arthe kāvye yadi īdṛśam vākyam bhavet tadā bālapriyāḥ anu ityādi
anūdyamānaiḥ vibhāva ādibhiḥ samākṣipta tva ādi vañcita tvāt iti arthaḥ
tat āha tad abhiprāyeṇa āha
tad nimitta tā iti etat yuvā ācaṣṭe kāvya ityādi

original: anūdyamānāṅgetyādikaṃ kṣipta ityādiśloke yojayan vyācaṣṭe---anūdyamānā ityādi /
analyzed: anūdyamāna aṅga ityādikam kṣiptaḥ ityādi śloke yojayan vyācaṣṭe anūdyamānāḥ ityādi

original: hastakṣepādayo vibhāvādaya ityatra yathāsaṃkhyenānvayo na vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: hasta kṣepa ādayaḥ vibhāva ādayaḥ iti atra yathāsaṃkhyena anvayaḥ na vivakṣitaḥ
hasta kṣepasya anubhāva tvāt anubhāva ādayaḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ
tad nimittam iti
te nimittāni yasya tat iti arthaḥ
rasa sajātīyam iti
rasa ātmakam sthāyi ātmakam vā iti arthaḥ
yasya vidhīyamāna aṃśasya iti asya eva vivaraṇam śāmbhava ityādi
vidhīyamāna aṃśāt iti viśeṣya sannidhānena yasya vidhīyamāna aṃśasya iti vyākhyātam
tat etat darśayitum āha tasmāt iti
bhāva viśeṣa pratītiḥ iti etat yvācaṣṭe bhāva ityādi
bhāva viśeṣe iti asya vivaraṇam preyaḥ laṅkāra viṣaye iti
sa kaḥ iti atra āha bhagavat ityādi
sarvatra ityādi
tejaḥ jala ādi ātmaka viruddha ubhaya sahakāriṇaḥ eva bīja ādeḥ aṅkura ādi kārya utpattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na upādānam iti
na utpādanam iti pāṭhena bhāvyam iti pratibhāti
evaṃvidha vridedha padārtha viṣayaḥ katham abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti ced
anūdyamānā evaṃvidha vācya viṣaye yā vārtā sā atrā api bhaviṣyati
evam vidhi anuvāda nayā āśrayeṇa atra śloke parihṛtaḥ tāvat virodhaḥ
kim ca nāyakasya abhinandanīya udayasya kasyacid prabhāva atiśaya varṇane tad pratipakṣāṇām

original: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyamādadhāti locanam yadi samastābhinayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ karuṇaḥ rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇām na vaiklavyam ādadhāti locanam yadi samasta abhinayaḥ

original: kriyate tadā viruddhārthaviṣayaḥ kathaṃ yugapadabhinayaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityāśayenāśaṅkamāna āha--evamiti /
analyzed: kriyate tadā viruddha artha viṣayaḥ katham yugapad abhinayaḥ kartum śakyaḥ iti āśayena āśaṅkamānaḥ āha evam iti
etat pariharati anūdyamānā iti

original: anūdyamānamevaṃvidhaṃ viruddhākāraṃ vācyaṃ yatra tādṛśo yo viṣayaḥ 'ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha' ityādistatra yā vārtā sātrāpīti /
analyzed: anūdyamānam evaṃvidham viruddha ākāram vācyam yatra tādṛśaḥ yaḥ viṣayaḥ ehi gaccha pata uttiṣṭha ityādiḥ tatra yā vārtā sā atra api iti

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati---'kṣipto hastāvalagna' ityādau prādhānyena bhītaviplutādidṛṣṭyupapādanakrameṇa prākariṇakastāvadarthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati kṣiptaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ ityādau prādhānyena bhīta vipluta ādi dṛṣṭi upapādana krameṇa prākariṇakaḥ tāvat arthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ

original: yadyapyatra karuṇo 'pi parāṅgameva tathāpi vipralambhāpekṣayā tasya tāvannikaṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ maheśvaraprabhāvaṃ prati sopayogatvāt /
analyzed: yadi api atra para aṅgam eva tathā api vipralambha apekṣayā tasya tāvat nikaṭam prākaraṇika tvam maheśvara prabhāvam prati sa upayoga tvāt
vipralambhasya tu kāmī iva iti utprekṣā upamā balena āyātasya dūra tvāt

original: evaṃ ca sāsranetrotpalābhiratyantaṃ prādhānyena karuṇopayogābhinayakrameṇa leśatastu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyātsūcanāṃ kṛtvā /
analyzed: evam ca sa asra netra utpalābhiḥ atyantam prādhānyena karuṇa upayoga abhinaya krameṇa leśataḥ tu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyāt sūcanām kṛtvā

original: kāmīvetyatra yadyapi praṇayakopocito 'bhinayaḥ kṛtastathāpi tataḥ pratīyamāno 'pyasau
analyzed: kāmī iva iti atra yadi api praṇaya kopa ucitaḥ bhinayaḥ kṛtaḥ tathā api tatas pratīyamānaḥ u pi asau

original: vipralambhaḥ samanantarābhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritamityādau sāṭopābhinayasamarpito
analyzed: vipralambhaḥ samanantara abhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritam ityādau sa āṭopa abhinaya samarpitaḥ
yaḥ bhagavat prabhāvaḥ tatra aṅgatāyām paryavasyati iti na kaścid virodhaḥ
etam virodha parihāram upasaṃharati evam iti
viṣaya antare tu prakāra antareṇa virodha parihāram āha kiñca iti
sāmājikānām viveka śālinām

original: kintu vīrasya yo 'sau krodho vyabhicāratāṃ pratipadyate tatphalarūpo 'sau karuṇarasaḥ /
analyzed: kintu vīrasya yaḥ sau krodhaḥ vyabhicāra tām pratipadyate tad phala rūpaḥ sau karuṇa rasaḥ
sva kāraṇa abhivyañjana dvāreṇa vīra āsvāda atiśayaḥ eva paryavasyati

original: vaiklavyamityasya pratyuta prītyatiśayanimittatāṃ pratipadyata ityatastasya kuṇṭhaśaktikatvāttadvirodhavidhāyino na kaściddoṣaḥ /
analyzed: vaiklavyam ityasya pratyuta prīti atiśaya nimitta tām pratipadyate iti atas tasya kuṇṭhaśaktika tvāt tad virodha vidhāyinaḥ na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: tasmādvākyārthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt vākya arthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasa virodhī iti vaktum nyāyyaḥ
na tu aṅga bhūtasya kasyacid

original: locanam yathoktam--'raudrasya caiva yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
analyzed: locanam yathā uktam raudrasya ca eva yat karma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇaḥ rasaḥ iti
tat āha prīti atiśaya iti

original: atrodāharaṇam--- kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍāsukhena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smartavyaṃ te mukhāsavasevanam /
analyzed: atra udāharaṇam kurabaka kuca āghāta krīḍā sukhena viyujyase bakula viṭapin smartavyam te mukha āsava sevanam

original: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatā- miti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ strayaḥ //
analyzed: caraṇa ghaṭanā śūnyaḥ yāsyasi aśoka sa śoka tā m iti nija pura tyāge yasya dviṣām jagaduḥ strayaḥ
bhāvasya vā iti

original: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya vyabhicāriṇo vā yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāra autsukyasya /
analyzed: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhāna bhūtasya vyabhicāriṇaḥ vā yathā vipralambha śṛṅgāre autsukyasya
kuravaka iti
mukha āsava sevanam iti api pāṭhaḥ

original: sa pādāghātādaśokastilakakuravakau vīkṣaṇālaṅganābhyām strīṇāṃ sparśātpriyaṅgurvikasati bakulaśśīdhugaṇḍūṣasekāt //
analyzed: sa pāda āghātāt aśokaḥ tilaka kuravakau vīkṣaṇa ālaṅganābhyām strīṇām sparśāt priyaṅguḥ vikasati bakulaḥ sūdhu gaṇḍūṣa sekāt
iti vacanam atra anusandheyam
vṛttau karuṇaḥ rasa eti
nibadhyamānaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
prīti atiśaya iti
tasya iti
karuṇasya iti arthaḥ
kuṇṭha śaktika tvāt iti
anya aṅga tvena śakteḥ kuṇṭhībhāvāt iti arthaḥ
na doṣaḥ iti anena asya sambandhaḥ
tad virodha vidhāyinaḥ iti tasya iti asya viśeṣaṇam
vīra rasa āsvāda atiśaya virodha vidhāyinaḥ iti arthaḥ
akuṇṭha śaktika tvāt iti pāṭhe tasya iti asya vīra āsvādasya iti arthaḥ
tad virodha vidhāyinaḥ iti pañjamī antam karuṇāt iti śeṣaḥ
nigamayati tasmāt ityādi
vākya arthībhūtasya iti
pradhānasya prastutasya iti arthaḥ
rasa virodhi iti vaktum iti
virodhi rasa ityādau virodhi padena vaktum iti arthaḥ
tathā ca vākya artha bhūta rasa ādi virodhi rasa sambandhi parigrahaḥ doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na tu ityādi

original: aṅgabhūtasya kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ na nyāyya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga bhūtasya kasyacid rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasa virodhī iti vaktum na nyāyyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathācāṅgabhūtasya kasyacidvirodhī yo lasaḥ tatsambandhiparigraho na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca aṅga bhūtasya kasyacid virodhī yaḥ lasaḥ tad sambandhi parigrahaḥ na doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
yathā ākṣipta ityādau śṛṅgāra virodhī yaḥ karuṇaḥ tad sambandhi parigrahaḥ

original: bhāvasya vetyatra bhāvapadena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣita ityāha locane---tasminnityādi /
analyzed: bhāvasya vā iti atra bhāva padena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣitaḥ iti āha locana etasmin ityādi
tasmin rase prakṛta rase
vākya artha bhūtasya ityasya vivaraṇam pradhāna bhūtasya iti

original: athavā vākyārthībhūtasyāpi kasyacitkaruṇarasaviṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāravastunā bhaṅgiviśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasaparipoṣāyaiva jāyate /
analyzed: athavā vākya arthībhūtasya api kasyacid karuṇa rasa viṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāra vastunā bhaṅgi viśeṣa āśrayeṇa saṃyojanam rasa paripoṣāya eva jāyate

original: yataḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatāṃ prāptāḥ pragavasthābhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇairvilāsairadhikataraṃ śokāveśamupajanayanti /
analyzed: yatas prakṛti madhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatām prāptāḥ prak avasthā bhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇaiḥ vilāsaiḥ adhikataram śoka āveśam upajanayanti

original: yathā--- locanam adhunā pūrvasminneva śloke kṣipta ityādau prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ pariharati---athaveti /
analyzed: yathā locanam adhunā pūrvasmin eva śloke kṣiptaḥ ityādau prakāra antareṇa virodham pariharati athavā iti
ayam ca atra bhāvaḥ pūrvam vipralambha karuṇayoḥ anyatra aṅga bhāva gamanāt nirvirodha tvam uktam

original: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasyaivāṅgatāṃ pratipannaḥ kathaṃ virodhīti vyavasthāpyate---tathā hi karuṇo raso nāmeṣṭajanavinipātādervibhāvādityuktam
analyzed: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasya eva aṅga tām pratipannaḥ katham virodhi iti vyavasthāpyate tathā hi karuṇaḥ rasaḥ nāma iṣṭa jana vinipāta ādeḥ vibhāvāt iti uktam
iṣṭa tā ca nāma ramaṇīya tā mūlā
tatas ca kāmī iva ārdra aparāghaḥ iti utprekṣayā idam uktam

original: śāṃbhavaśaravahniceṣṭitāvalokane prāktanapraṇayakalahavṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇa idānīṃ vidhvastatayā śokavibhāvatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: śāṃbhava śara vahni ceṣṭita avalokane prāktana praṇaya kalaha vṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇaḥ idānīm vidhvasta tayā śoka vibhāva tām pratipadyate
tat āha bhaṅgi viśeṣa iti
agrāmya tayā vibhāva anubhāva ādi rūpa tā prāpaṇayā bālapriyā atha vā ityādi granthasya artha antara bhrama nivāraṇāya avatārayati adhunā ityādi

original: atha veti ityasya sthāne athavetyādinā doṣābhāva ityanteneti ca pāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā iti ityasya sthāne athavā ityādinā doṣa abhāvaḥ iti antena iti ca pāṭhaḥ
vṛttau athavā ityādi
vākya artha bhūtasya iti
vācyasya iti arthaḥ

original: apiśabdaḥ anantaroktanītyā rasaparapoṣaṇe āpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati 'kasyacidi'ti /
analyzed: api śabdaḥ anantara uktanītyā rasa para poṣaṇe āpātataḥ virodham dyotayati kasyacid iti
vibhāva ādi rūpasya kasyacid iti arthaḥ
karuṇa rasa viṣayasya kuṇa aṅgasya
tādṛśena vācya tayā tad tulyena
yat vā avirodhinā śṛṅgāra vastunā śṛṅgāra aṅgena
uktasya udāharaṇam āha ayam ityādi
kāvyaprakāśe api udāhṛtaḥ yam ślokaḥ
prakṛte kṣiptaḥ ityādau uktam yojayan āha tat atra ityādi

analyzed: sā viṣaya antara sañcāriṇī me saṃvid antaḥkaraṇam tad vṛttiḥ vā tvām spṛśantī kiñcid viṣayīkurvāṇā
vilīya tvad ākāra tā rūpa tva sambandham avāpya yatra jñāne śṛṅgāra viruddha rasa sparśaḥ

original: śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalamavirodhalakṣaṇayoge sati na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ
analyzed: śṛṅgāra aṅgānām yaḥ sa na kevalam avirodha lakṣaṇa yoge sati na duṣyati yāvat vineyān unmukhīkartum

original: kāvyaśobhārthameva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ kāvyaśobhārthameva
analyzed: kāvya śobhā artham eva vā kriyamāṇaḥ na duṣyati yāvat vineyān unmukhīkartum kāvya śobhā artham eva

original: śṛṅgārarasāṅgairunmukhīkṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra rasa aṅgaiḥ unmukhīkṛtāḥ santaḥ hi vineyāḥ sukham vinaya upadeśān gṛhṇanti

original: sadācāropadeśarūpā hi nāṭakādigoṣṭhī locanam ityatra śāntavibhāvānubhāvānāmapi śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nirūpaṇam /
analyzed: sat ācāra upadeśa rūpā hi nāṭaka ādi goṣṭhī locanam iti atra śānta vibhāva anubhāvānām api śṛṅgāra bhaṅgyāḥ nirūpaṇam

original: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthaṃ naiva duṣyatīti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: vineyān unmukhīkartum yā kāvya śobhā tad artham na eva duṣyati iti sambandhaḥ
vā grahaṇena pakṣa antaram ucyate
tat eva vyācaṣṭena kevalam iti
vā śabdasya etat yu ākhyānam
avirodha lakṣaṇam paripoṣa parihāra ādi pūrva uktam

original: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthamapi vā viruddhasamāveśaḥ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktaiḥ prakāraiḥ,
analyzed: vineyān unmukhīkartum yā kāvya śobhā tad artham api vā viruddha samāveśaḥ na kevalam pūrvoktaiḥ prakāraiḥ
na tu kāvya śobhā vineya unmukhīkaraṇam antareṇa āste
vyavadhāna avyavadhāne na api labhyete yathā anyaiḥ vyākhyāte
sukham iti
rañjanā puraḥsaram iti arthaḥ

original: nanu kāvyaṃ krīḍārūpaṃ kva ca vedādigocarā upadeśakathā ityāśaṅkyāha--sadācāreti /

original: yadvā--vilīyāpi vilīyate dravībhūyāpi atyantaṃ drutā bhavatītyarthaḥ /

original: bhaktānāṃ cittadrutiḥ prasiddhā putrikāpakṣe tu candrakarasparśena kiñcidārdrībhūya punassarvāvayavāvacchedenārdrībhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: bhaktānām citta drutiḥ prasiddhā putrikā pakṣe tu candra kara sparśena kiñcid ārdrībhūya punar sarva avayava avacchedena ārdrībhavati iti arthaḥ
atra saṃvid ādau viraha tapta nāyikā tva ādi pratītyā śṛṅgāra vibhāva tva ādi prāptiḥ
tat āha śṛṅgārabhaṅgyāḥ nirūpaṇam iti

na virodhī

original: rasādimayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthagbhūtam' iti /

saḥ rthaḥ śaitya pāvana tva ādi arthaḥ
vyāpāreṇa iti anantaram kintu vyāpāra antareṇa iti śeṣaḥ

original: yathāhi ghaṭe niṣpanne tadupādānakāraṇānāṃ na pṛthagupalambhastathaiva vākye tadarthe vā pratīte padatadarthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe  #
analyzed: yathā hi ghaṭe niṣpanne tad upādānakāraṇānām na pṛthak upalambhaḥ tathā eva vākye tad arthe vā pratīte pada tad arthānām teṣām tadā vibhakta tayā upalambhe

original: saugatakāpilamate tu yadyapyupādātavya ghaṭakāle upādānānāṃ na sattā ekatra kṣaṇakṣayitvena paratra tirobhūtatvena tathāpi pṛthaktayā nāstyupalambha  #

original: na hyarthādyvaṅgyatrayapratītiryā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāgapi lakṣyate /

original: yāpi lakṣaṇarūpā guṇavṛttiḥ sāpyupalakṣaṇīyārthasaṃbandhamātrāśrayeṇa cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītiṃ vināpi sambhavatyeva,

yathā mañcāḥ krośanti ityādau viṣaye
locanam vācya dharma iti
vācya viṣayaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ bhidhā vyāpāraḥ tasya āśrayeṇa tad upabṛṃhaṇāya iti arthaḥ
śruta artha pattau iva artha antara rasya abhidheya artha uṃntarasya abhidheya artha upapādāne eva
tatra gaumasya udāharaṇam āha yathā iti
dvitīyam api prakāram vyañjaka tva śūnyam nidarśayitum upakramate iyā api iti
tad abhāve sa vyañjaka tva vyāpāraḥ nā evā unmīlati
pratyāvṛttya vācyaḥ eva viśrānteḥ
kṣaṇa dṛṣṭa naṣṭa divya vibhava prākṛta puruṣa vat
bālapriyā vācakasya iti śeṣaḥ
bhāva artha vivaraṇam tad upabṛṃhaṇāya iti
abhidheya artha upabṛṃhaṇāya ityaḥ
katham guṇa vṛtteḥ tad upabṛṃhaṇa ārthatvam iti atas sa dṛṣṭāntam āha śruta ityādi

original: yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityādau śrutasya pīnatvāde rupapādakatayā rātribhojanādikaṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: yathā pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte ityādau śrutasya pīna tva ādeḥ rupapādaka tayā rātri bhojana ādikam kalpyate

original: kalpitasya tasyārthāntarasya pīnatvādyupapādana eva paryavasānañca tathā guṇavṛttisthale
analyzed: kalpitasya tasya artha antarasya pīna tva ādi upapādane eva paryavasānam ca tathā guṇa vṛtti sthale
rthāntarasya lakṣyasya pada antara abhidheya artha upapādane eva yatas tasmāt iti arthaḥ
vṛttau vyaṅgya mātra āśrayeṇa iti atra mātra padena cāru tva hetuḥ mukhya vyaṅgayam vyāvartyate
priye janaiti

original: priya iti tīkṣṇatvādatyādivadguṇarūpahetukathanaṃ punaruktapadenānupādeyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti pūrvamevoktam /
analyzed: priyaḥ iti tīkṣṇa tvāt atyādi vat guṇa rūpa hetu kathanam punarukta padena anupādeyatvam lakṣyate iti pūrvam eva uktam
eṣu udāharaṇeṣu tīkṣṇa tva ādi guṇānām ādhikyam vyaṅgyam
tat tu na cāru tva kārī iti bhāvaḥ
upalakṣaṇīyā iti

original: upalaṇīyo lakṣyo yo 'rtho mañjasthabālakādistena saha yassambandha ādhārādheyabhāvādirmañcādapadamukhyārthasya tanmātrāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: upalaṇīyaḥ lakṣyaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ mañja stha bālaka ādiḥ tena saha yaḥ sambandhaḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāva ādiḥ mañcāda pada mukhya arthasya tad mātra āśrayeṇa iti arthaḥ
mañcāḥ iti

original: atra mañcasthabālakānāṃ bahutvādakaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadapi na cārutvakāri /
analyzed: atra mañca stha bālakānām bahu tva ādakam vyaṅgyam tat api na cāru tva kāri
cāru rūpam iti etat vivṛṇoti

original: nanu vināpi cāruvyaṅgyapratītiṃ vyañjanāvyāpāro bhavatvityata āha--tadabhāva ityādi /
analyzed: nanu vinā api cāru vyaṅgya pratītim vyañjanā vyāpāraḥ bhavatu iti atas āha tad abhāve ityādi
tad abhāve cāru vyaṅgya abhāve
saḥ lakṣaṇā mūlakaḥ
unmīlati prakāśate
kutas iti atas āha pratyāvṛtya ityādi
kṣaṇa iti

original: kṣaṇa eva dṛṣṭo naṣṭaśca divyavibhavo yasya saḥ tathāvidho yaḥ prākṛto daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat /
analyzed: kṣaṇaḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ naṣṭaḥ ca divya vibhavaḥ yasya saḥ tathāvidhaḥ yaḥ prākṛtaḥ daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat

original: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛtavibhāva eva tathā vyañjanāvyāpārasya yatra tu sā cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītihetustatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva  #
analyzed: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛta vibhāvaḥ eva tathā vyañjanā vyāpārasya yatra tu sā cāru rūpa vyaṅgya pratīti hetuḥ tatra api vyañjaka tva anupraveśena eva
vācaka tva vat
asambhavinā ca arthena yatra vyavahāraḥ

original: yathā---'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm' ityādau tatra cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītireva prayojiketi
analyzed: yathā suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm ityādau tatra cāru rūpa vyaṅgya pratītiḥ eva prayojikā iti

original: tathāvidhe 'pi locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye 'rthe viśrāntistatra kiṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--yatra tviti /
analyzed: tathāvidhe locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye rthe viśrāntiḥ tatra kim kartavyam iti āśaṅkya āha yatra tu iti
asti tatra aparaḥ vyañjana vyāpāraḥ para sphuṭaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭāntam para aṅgīkṛtam eva āha vācakatva vat iti

original: vācakatve hi tvayaivāṅgīkṛto vyañjanavyāpāraḥ prathamaṃ dhvaniprabhedamapratyācakṣaṇeneti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vācaka tve hi tvayā eva aṅgīkṛtaḥ vyañjana vyāpāraḥ prathamam dhvani prabhedam apratyācakṣaṇena iti bhāvaḥ

original: kiñca vastvantare mukhye sambhavati sambhavadeva vastvantaraṃ mukhyamevāropyate viṣayāntaramātratastvāropavyavahāra iti jīvitamupacārasya,
analyzed: kiñca vastu antare mukhye sambhavati sambhavat eva vastu antaram mukhyam eva āropyate viṣaya antara mātratas tu āropa vyavahāraḥ iti jīvitam upacārasya

original: suvarṇapuṣpāṇāṃ tu mūlata evāsambhavāttaduccayanasya tatra ka āropavyavahāraḥ;
analyzed: suvarṇa puṣpāṇām tu mūlataḥ evā asambhavāt tad uccayanasya tatra kaḥ āropa vyavahāraḥ
suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm iti hi syāt āropaḥ
tasmāt atra vyañjana vyāpāraḥ eva pradhāna bhūtaḥ na āropa vyavahāraḥ
sa param vyañjana vyāpāra anarodhi tayā uttiṣṭhati
tat āha asambhavinā iti
prayojikā iti

original: vyaṅgyameva hi prayojanarūpaṃ pratītiviśrāmasthāmāropite tvasambhavati pratitiviśrāntirāśaṅkanīyāpi na bhavati /

original: nanu tarhi suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīmiti prayogaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata āha--suvarṇetyādi /
analyzed: nanu tarhi suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm iti prayogaḥ katham upapadyate iti atas āha suvarṇa ityādi

original: ityāropassyāddhīti sambandhaḥ. tadāropaṃ vinā tasya mahākaviprayogasyānirvāhāditi bhāvaḥ /

original: nanvasambhavadapi viṣaye guṇavṛttau satyāmapi dhvanivyavahāra eva yuktyanurodhī /

original: tu tadekarūpā sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratītihetutvādviyaṣāntare locanam satyāmapīti /
analyzed: tu tad eka rūpā sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādinī pratīyamānā pratīti hetu tvāt viyaṣa antare locanam satyām api iti

original: vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yo viśeṣastenāviśiṣṭā avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣo bhedanaṃ yasyāḥ vyañjakatvaṃ na tasyā bheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tena aviśiṣṭā avidyamānam viśiṣṭam viśeṣaḥ bhedanam yasyāḥ vyañjaka tvam na tasyāḥ bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadi vā vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena vyāpāraviśeṣemāviśiṣṭā nyakkṛtasvābhāvā āsamantādvyāptā /

tat ekā iti

original: tena vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena sahaikaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati /
analyzed: tena vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇena saha ekam rūpam yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati

original: na hi guṇavṛtteścārupratītihetutvamastīti bālapriyā vyaṅgyamātrānvitamāropitameva pratītiviśrāntisthānamastu,

kim sa cāra rūpa vyaṅgya samāśrayaṇena iti atas āha āropitaḥ ityādi
asambhavati iti hetu garbham
kṣaṇa mātram avalambitāyām iti anena guṇa vṛtti viṣaya bhūta arthasya avāntara tātparya gocara tvam darśitam
vṛttau tathāvidhe viṣaye iti
asambhavat arthaka vākye iti arthaḥ
upasaṃharati tasmāt ityādi
vyañjaka tva viśeṣa aviśiṣṭa iti etat prakṛta ānuguṇye vyācaṣṭe vyañjaka tva ityādi
tena iti karaṇe tṛtīyā

tasyāḥ guṇa vṛtteḥ

vyākhyāya vyañjaka tva prādhānyasya anya aprādhānyasya ca pratipāditasya upasaṃhāra para tayā api etam
grantham vyācaṣṭe yadi vā ityādi
yadi vai atha ca
viśiṣṭā viśeṣitā na bhavati iti aviśiṣṭa

original: yadvā viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yasyāsseti vyatpattimabhipretyāha--nyakkṛtasvabhāveti /
analyzed: yat vā viśiṣṭam viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ a vidyamānam viśiṣṭam vyatpattim abhipretya āha nyakkṛta svabhāvā iti
vyañjaka tva viśeṣeṇa aviśiṣṭā iti vigraham dhātūnām bahvartham ca abhipretya prakāra antaram āha āsamantāt yvāpta iti
yat iva iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
nanu tathā api guṇa vṛtteḥ vyañjaka tva eka rūpa tvam astu iti śaṅkāyām uktam
na tu tad eka rūpā iti tat vivṛṇoti tena ityādi
tad eka rūpa tva abhāve hetuḥ sahṛdaya ityādi
na iti asya anuṣaṅgaḥ

original: yato guṇavṛttiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavatyato na tadekarūpeti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: yatas guṇa vṛttiḥ sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavati atas na tad ekarūpā iti sambandhaḥ

original: vyaṅgyagataṃ sahṛdayahṛdayāhṇādakatvaṃ pratīyamānatvañca vyañjakatve samāropya guṇavṛttestanniṣedhapūrvaktaṃ tadekarūpatvaṃ niṣiddhamiti bodhyam
analyzed: vyaṅgya gatam pratīyamāna tvam ca vyañjaka tve samāropya guṇa vṛtteḥ tad niṣedha pūrvaktam tad eka rūpa tvam niṣiddham iti bodhyam
evam guṇa vṛtteḥ vyañjaka tva eka rūpa tva abhāva pratipādanena vyañjaka tvasya guṇa vṛtti bhinna tvam

original: api ca vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayorgharmaḥ sa prasiddhasambandhānurodhīti na kasyācidvimativiṣayatāmarbahati /
analyzed: api ca vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ śabda arthayoḥ gharmaḥ sa prasiddha sambandha anurodhi iti na kasyācid vimati viṣaya tām arbahati

original: śabdārtharyorhi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācyavācakabhāvākhyāstamanurundhāna eva vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagrantarasambandhādaupādhikaḥ  #
analyzed: śabda artha ryoḥ hi prasiddhaḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ vācya vācaka bhāva ākhyāḥ tam anurundhānaḥ eva vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ sāmagra antara sambandhāt aupādhikaḥ

original: ata eva vācakatvāttasya viśeṣaḥ vācakatvaṃ hi śabdaviśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpattikālādārabhya tadavinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /

sa tu aniyataḥ

original: niyatasvabhāvācca vācyavācakatvādaupādhikatvenāniyataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ kathaṃ na bhinnanimittamiti darśayati--api ceti /

mithyā artha tvam uktam iti
asambaddha arthasya api puruṣa abhipreta tva sambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tathāvoktarūpasya śabdārthasambandhasya nityatve 'pi pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ puruṣābhiprāyānuvidhāyitvāttadabhipretaṃ yadvākyārthasyāsatyatvaṃ,
analyzed: tathā ava ukta rūpasya śabda artha sambandhasya nitya tve pi pauruṣeya vākyānām puruṣa abhiprāya anuvidhāyi tvāt tat abhipretam yat vākya arthasya asatya tvam
tad vākyasya mithyā arthaka tvena aprāmāṇyam

original: apauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāntu vakturabhāvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva prāmāṇyañceti bodhyam /
analyzed: apauruṣeyāṇām vākyānām tu vaktuḥ abhāvena teṣām sarveṣām eva prāmāṇyam ca iti bodhyam
vṛttau tena saha iti
puruṣa abhiprāyeṇa saha iti arthaḥ
abhidhānasya śabdasya
vācya vācaka sambandha abhāvāt iti

original: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yassambandhastasya vācyavācakabhāvatvaṃ nāstīti darśitaṃ,
analyzed: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yaḥ sambandhaḥ tasya vācya vācaka bhāva tvam na asti iti darśitam

aniyata tvena hetunā svābhāvika tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
atha abhiprāyasya vyaṅgya tva uktim āśritya śaṅkate nanu anena ityādi
prasaktaḥ prāptaḥ
yat vā āpatti viṣayaḥ
atra hetum āha sarveṣām ityādi
iṣṭa āpattim darśayati satyam ityādi
satyam etat iti
abhiprāya prakāśanena yat vyañjaka tvam tat sarveṣām asti iti arthaḥ
viśeṣam āha kintu ityādi

original: yadvyajakatvaṃ tattu vācakatvānna bhidyata iti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: yat vyajaka tvam tat tu vācaka tvāt na bhidyate iti sambandhaḥ
vaktṛ abhiprāya prakāśanena iti asya sthāne vaktṛ abhiprāya viśiṣṭa artha prakāśanena iti ca pāṭhaḥ
aviśiṣṭam sādhāraṇam
vācaka tvāt na bhidyate iti atra hetum āha vyaṅgyam hi ityā atyādi
na tu vivakṣita tvena

original: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tadyvañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakam /
analyzed: yasya tu vivakṣita tvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ dhvani vyavahārasya prayojakam

original: locanam gāmānayeti śrute 'pyabhiprāye vyakte tadabhiprāyaviśiṣṭo 'rtha evābhipretānayanādakriyāyogyo na tvabhiprāyamātreṇa kiñcitkṛtyamiti
analyzed: locanam gām ānaya iti śrute pi abhiprāye vyakte tad abhiprāya viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ eva abhipreta ānayanāt akriyā yogyaḥ na tu abhiprāya mātreṇa kiñcid kṛtyam iti
vivakṣita tvena iti
prādhānyena iti arthaḥ
yasya tu iti
dhvani udāharaṇeṣu iti bhāvaḥ
kāvya vākyebhyaḥ hi na nayana anayana ādi upayoginī pratītiḥ abhyarthyate
api tu pratīti viśrānti kāriṇī
sā ca abhiprāya niṣṭhā ena na abhipreta vastu paryavasānā

original: nanvevamabhiprāyasyaiva vyaṅgyatvāttrividhaṃ vyaṅgyamiti yaduktaṃ tatkathamityāha--- bālapriyā 'nāntarīyakataye'ti /
analyzed: nanu evam abhiprāyasya eva vyaṅgya tvāt trividham vyaṅgyam iti yat uktam tat katham iti āha bālapriyā nāntarīyaka tayā iti
avinābhūta tvena iti arthaḥ
bhāvam vivṛṇoti locanegām ityādi
abhiprāye vyakte pi iti sambandhaḥ
kṣīra grahaṇa ādi arthaka gavānayana abhiprāye vyakte pi iti arthaḥ
arthaḥ go karmaka tva ādi arthaḥ
na tu ityādi

original: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādyvaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: go karmaka ānayana ādi kriyā rūpa artham vinā abhiprāya asiddhiḥ atas ca na vācaka tvāt pṛthak vyañjaka tvam vācya ādi vaṅgyam iva iti ca bhāvaḥ
abhiprāya rūpa vyaṅgyasya vivakṣita tva prāpti abhāvāt niṣedha anupapattim āśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe prādhānyena iti

vivakṣita tvena sthitiḥ iti atra ākāṅkṣām pūrayati dhvani udāharaṇeṣu iti
vṛttau tad vyajyaka tvam iti asya tad karmaka vyañjaka tvam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkyāyāmabhiprāyamāha---kāvyavācakyebhya  #

original: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /

upalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā
galita bheda prapañca tve hetuḥ avidyā ityādi
śabda pada vivaraṇam śabda artha ākhyam iti

original: śabda ityartha iti cākhyā yasya tat /
analyzed: śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ iti ca ākhyā yasya tat
nāma rūpa ātmakam iti arthaḥ
yat vā śabda arthayoḥ ākhyā sphuraṇam yasmin tad śabda artha bhrama adhiṣṭhānam
nirūpādhi rūpam āha prakāśa ityādi
sva prakāśa jñāna svarūpam iti arthaḥ
bṛhadhātoḥ brahma śabda niṣpattim abhipretya vivṛṇoti vyāpaka tvena bṛhat iti
evam nirupādhi para tayā vyākhyāya sa upādhi para tayā api vyācaṣṭe viśeṣa ityādi

original: viśeṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām vyaṣṭi rūpāṇām sarveṣām śaktibhiḥ nirbhara tā pūrṇa tā tayā ca iti arthaḥ
bṛhat iti anena sambadhnāti
bṛhadhātoḥ bahma śabda niṣpattim abhipretya vivṛṇoti vyāpaka tvena bṛhat iti
evam nirupādhi para tayā vyākhyā sa upādhi para tayā api vyācaṣṭe viśeṣa ityādi

original: viseṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyaṣṭi rūpāṇām sarveṣām śaktibhiḥ nirbhara tā pūrṇa tā tayā ca iti arthaḥ
bṛhat iti anena sambadhnāti
bṛhadhātoḥ bahma śabda niṣpati abhiprāyeṇa ca āha bṛṃhitam ityādi
bṛṃhitam iti kartari ktaḥ
katham paripoṣa rūpam bṛṃhaṇam iti atas āha viśva ityādi

original: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tadviṣayā yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete /
analyzed: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tad viṣayāḥ yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kim virodha avirodhau cintyete

original: kṛtrimaśabdārthasambandhavādināṃ tu yuktividāmanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ vyañjakabhāvaḥ śabdānāmarthāntarāṇāmivāvirodhaśceti na pratikṣepyapadavīmavatarati
analyzed: kṛtrima śabda artha sambandha vādinām tu yukti vidām anubhava siddhaḥ eva ayam vyañjaka bhāvaḥ śabdānām artha antarāṇām iva avirodhaḥ ca iti na pratikṣepya padavīm avatarati

original: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vaiyākaraṇāstāvadbrahmapadenānyatkiñcidicchanti tatra kā kathā vācakatvavyañjakatvayoḥ,
analyzed: locanam etat uktam bhavati vaiyākaraṇāḥ tāvat brahma padena anyat kiñcid icchanti tatra kā kathā vācaka tva vyañjaka tvayoḥ
avidyā pade tu taiḥ api vyāpāra antaram abhyupagatam eva
etat ca prathama uddyote vitatya nirūpitam

original: evaṃ vākyavidāṃ padavidāṃ cāvimativiṣayatvaṃ pradarśya māṇatattvavidāṃ tārkikāṇāmapi na yuktātra vimatiriti darśayitumāha--kṛtrimeti /

atra rūpake pi atiśayaḥ bālapriyā viruddhyeta iti bhāvaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram āha alaṅkāra mātram ityādi
kiñcid alaṅkāra mātram atiśayokti anāliṅgitam api dṛśyate
tat api aghaṭamānam syāt iti arthaḥ
dvitīyam utthāpya dūṣayati atha iti
sā atiśayoktiḥ

original: kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā kāvyajīvitatvapradarśanāya sarvā vakroktisyaiṣetyuktā tathāpītyaṅgīkṛtya vādasūcakam /
analyzed: kāvya jīvita tvena ittham vivakṣitā kāvya jīvita tva pradarśanāya sarvā vakrokti sya eṣā iti uktā tathā api iti aṅgīkṛtya vāda sūcakam
kim atiśayokti mātrasya jīvita tvam vivakṣitam
kim vā yat kiñcid viśiṣṭasya
na ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti āha anaucatyena api iti
sā iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
yathā alpam nirmitam ityādau
tathā kāvya jīvitam
dvitīyam anuvat api aucityavatī iti
yathā yat viśramya ityādau
tarhi asmad abhimatam siddham iti āha aucitya nibandhanam ityādi
rasa ādikam eva aucitya prayojakam iti prāk eva uktam
mukhya tve hetuḥ antaryāmī iti
na tu sā iti
sā aucityavatī atiśayoktiḥ
prasaṅgāt āha etena ityādi
etena pratyuktāḥ iti sambandhaḥ
sva vacanam eva iti
aucitya ghaṭita iti vacanam eva iti arthaḥ
dhvani sadbhāva iti
aucityasya rasa ādi nibandhana tvāt rasa ādi dhvani sadbhāvasya abhyupagame pramāṇībhavet iti arthaḥ
upasaṃharati tasmāt ityādi
abheda upacāraḥ eva ayam iti

original: sarvā vakroktissaiṣeti nirdeśo mukhaṃ candra ityādivadabhedopacāra evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvā vakroktiḥ sā eṣā iti nirdeśaḥ mukham candraḥ ityādi vat abheda upacāraḥ eva iti arthaḥ
aupacārika tva upapādana phalam āha tatas ca ityādi
tasyāḥ ca ityādi granthasya prakṛtena saṅgatim darśayan āha yat uktam ityādi
uktam iti
upacāra nimittatayā pūrva uktam iti arthaḥ
alaṅkāra antara svīkaraṇam iti
alaṅkāra atara saṅkīrṇa tvam iti arthaḥ

original: tasyā ityasya vācyatvenetyanenāpi sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--sāpītyādi /
analyzed: tasyāḥ iti asya vācya tvena iti anena api sambandhaḥ iti vyācaṣṭe sā api ityādi
sā atiśayoktiḥ
atra udāharaṇam lāvaṇya ityādi uktam eva darśayati yathā ityādi
atra vācyālaṅkāran darśayan atiśayokteḥ vyaṅgya tva abhāvam āha atra ityādi
nayana ādīnām utpala tva ādi rūpaṇāt rūpakasya vācya tvam tāvat vyaktam eva
atiśayokteḥ tu kadācid prādhānyena kadācid guṇa bhāvena
tatra ādye pakṣe vācya alaṅkāra mārgaḥ
dvitīye tu dhvanau antarbhāvaḥ
tṛtīye tu guṇībhūta vyaṅgya rūpa tā
ayam ca prakāraḥ nyeṣām api alaṅkārāṇām asti
teṣām tu na sarva viṣayaḥ
atiśayokteḥ tu sarva alaṅkāra viṣayaḥ sambhavati iti ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamukhena tattvapratilambhaḥ yathā rupakopamātulyayogatānidarśanādiṣu
analyzed: yeṣu ca alaṅkāreṣu sādṛśya mukhena tattva pratilambhaḥ yathā

original: teṣu gamyamānadharmamukhenaiva yatsādṛśyaṃ tadeva śobhātiśayaśāli bhavatīti te sarve
analyzed: teṣu gamyamāna dharma mukhena eva yat sādṛśyam tat eva śobhā atiśaya śāli bhavati iti te sarve
pi cāru tva atiśaya yoginaḥ santaḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya eva locanam śabda spṛś eva
asya traividhyasya viṣaya vibhāgam āha tatra iti

original: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye ya ādyaḥ prakārastasmin /
analyzed: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye yaḥ ādyaḥ prakāraḥ tasmin

original: nanvatiśayoktireva cedevambhūtā tatkimapekṣayā prathamaṃ tāvaditi kramaḥ sūcita ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ cati /
analyzed: nanu atiśayoktiḥ eva ced evambhūtā tat kim apekṣayā prathamam tāvat iti kramaḥ sūcitaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha ayam ca iti
nirūpitaḥ laṅkāra antare pi anupraveśa ātmakaḥ
nanu evam api prayamam iti kena āśayena uktam iti āśaṅkya āha teṣām iti

original: evamalaṅkāreṣu tāvadvyaṅgyasparśo 'stītyuktyā tatra kiṃ vyaṅgyatvena bhātīti /
analyzed: evam alaṅkāreṣu tāvat vyaṅgya sparśaḥ sti iti uktyā tatra kim vyaṅgya tvena bhāti iti
vibhāgam vyutpādayati yeṣu ca iti
rūpaka ādīnām pūrvam eva uktam svarūpam

original: nidarśanāyāstu 'kriyayaiva tadarthasya bālapriyā vyaṅgyatayā sthātumārabdhāyā api aparaiveti śabdena spṛṣṭatvādvācyatvamāpatitamiti dvayorvācyatvamityarthaḥ
analyzed: nidarśanāyāḥ tu kriyayā eva tad arthasya bālapriyā vyaṅgya tayā sthātum ārabdhāyāḥ api aparā evā iti śabdena spṛṣṭa tvāt vācya tvam āpatitam iti dvayoḥ vācya tvam iti arthaḥ
navya mate tu aparā eva iti atra bhedaka atiśayoktiḥ
yatra utpalāni ityādau rūpaka atiśayoktiḥ
bhojarāja mate tu atra samāsoktiḥ ityādi mata bhedāḥ bodhyāḥ
asya iti
viṣaya vibhāga virahe traividhya pradarśanasya manda phala tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
ādyaḥ prakāraḥ dvayoḥ api vācya tatva ātmakaḥ
atiyoktau uktasya prakārasya ayam ca ityādinā alaṅkāra antareṣu atideśaḥ kṛtaḥ
tat kimartham iti atas vatārayati nanu ityādi
ced iti asandigdhe sandeha vacanam
atiśayokteḥ eva etat yujyeta
tasyāḥ sarva alaṅkāra śarīra svīkaraṇa arha tvasya ukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
nirūpita yā ityādi

original: kramo hi satsveva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta,
analyzed: kramaḥ hi satsu eva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta
na anyathā iti bhāvaḥ
nirūpitaḥ iti
prakāraḥ iti śeṣaḥ
prathamam iti kena āśayena uktam iti
prāthamyam prādhānyena iti vaktavyam prādhānyam kinnibandhanam iti arthaḥ
āha teṣām iti iti
teṣām ityādinā viśeṣaḥ iti antena āha iti arthaḥ
vyaṅgya sparśaḥ sti iti uktvā iti
vācya alaṅkāra vargaḥ yam ityādi granthena uktvā iti arthaḥ
kim ita
alaṅkāra antaram vastu antaram vā iti arthaḥ
vṛttau tad tva pratilambhaḥ iti
alaṅkāra tva prāptiḥ iti arthaḥ
rūpaka ityādi

original: rūpakādau sādṛśyaṃ vyaṅgyamupamā tu tatsvarūpaiveti bodhyam /
analyzed: rūpaka ādau sādṛśyam vyaṅgyam upamā tu tad svarūpā eva iti bodhyam
locane kriyayā iti
lakṣaṇam idam udā viśiṣṭasya upadarśanam
viṣayāḥ
samāsokti ākṣepa paryāyoktā ādiṣu tu gamyamāna aṃśa avinābhāvena eva tattva vyavasthānāt guṇībhūta vyaṅga tā nirvivādā eva
tatra ca guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tāyām alaṅkārāṇām keṣāñcid alaṅkāra viśeṣa garbha tāyām niyamaḥ
yathā vyāja stuteḥ preyaḥ laṅkāra garbha tve
keṣāñcid alaṅkāra mātra garbha tāyām niyamaḥ
yathā sandeha ādīnām upamā garbha tve
keṣāṃcid alaṅkārāṇām paraspara garbha tā api sambhavati
yathā dīpaka upamayoḥ
tatra dīpakam upamā garbha tvena prasiddham
upamā api kadācid dīpaka chāyā anuyāyinī
yathā mālā upamā

original: tathā hi 'prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ' ityādau sphuṭaiva dīpakacchāyā lakṣyate /
analyzed: tathā hi prabhā mahatyā śikhayā iva dīpaḥ ityādau sphuṭā eva dīpaka chāyā lakṣyate
locanam iṣṭā nidarśanā iti
udāharaṇam ayam manda dyutiḥ bhāsvānaḥ tam prati yiyāsati
udayaḥ patanāya iti śrīmataḥ bodhayan narān
prayaḥ laṅkāra iti
cāṭu paryavasāyi tvāt tasyāḥ
sā ca udāhṛtā eva dvitīya uddyote smābhiḥ

original: upamāgarbhatva ityapamāśabdena sarva eva tadviśeṣā rūpakādayaḥ,
analyzed: upamā garbha tve iti apamā śabdena sarve eva tad viśeṣāḥ rūpaka ādayaḥ
sarva sāmānyam iti tena sarvam ākṣiptam eva
sphuṭā eva iti

original: 'tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' ityetena dīpasthānīyena dīpanāddīpakamatrānupraviṣṭaṃ pratīyamānatayā,
analyzed: tayā sa pūtaḥ ca vibhūṣitaḥ ca iti etena dīpa sthānīyena dīpanāt dīpakam atra anupraviṣṭam pratīyamāna tayā
sādhāraṇa dharma abhidhānam bālapriyā haraṇañca bhāmahīyam
yiyāsati yātum ārabhate
yathā atra upamāyāḥ vyaṅgya tvam tathā kuvalayānanda ādau spaṣṭam
vṛttau guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya eva viṣayāḥ iti
gamyamāna dharmasya vācya siddhi aṅga tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
tad tva vyavasthānāt iti
samāsokti tva ādi vyavasthiteḥ iti arthaḥ
guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā iti
vācyārtha upaskāraka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
preyaḥ laṅkāra garbha tve hetum āha locane cāṭu iti
sā ca iti
vyāja stutiḥ ca iti arthaḥ
keṣāṃ cat alaṅkāra mātra garbha tāyām iti atra alaṅkāra mātra śabdena alaṅkāra sāmānya abhidhānāt punar upamā garbha tve iti tad viśeṣa abhidhānam vyāhatam iti atas
tad viśeṣāḥ upamā viśeṣāḥ
upamā eva tirobhūta bhedā rūpakam iṣyate ityādi vacanāt iti bhāvaḥ
rūpaka ādayaḥ iti
vivakṣitāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
upamā śabdaḥ trā upamā alaṅkārasya na vācakaḥ kintu aupamyasya iti āha athavā ityādi
sarva sāmānyam iti
upamā rūpaka ādi sarva sādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ
katham mālā upamāyān dīpaka chāyā avagamaḥ iti atas upapādayati tayā ityādi
dīpa sthānīyena dīpanāt iti

original: anena dīpa iveti dīpayatīti vā dīpakaśabdavyutpattirdarśitā /
analyzed: anena dīpaḥ iva iti dīpayati iti vā dīpaka śabda vyutpattiḥ darśitā
spaṣṭam idam kuvalayānande
pratīyamāna tayā dīpakam atra anu praviṣṭam iti sambandhaḥ
pratīyamāna tayā vyaṅgya tayā
atra mālā upamā sthale prabhā mahatyā ityādau

original: tadevaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasaṃsparśe saṃti cārutvātiśayayogino rūpakādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sarva eva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam vyaṅgya aṃśa saṃsparśe saṃti cāru tva atiśaya yoginaḥ rūpaka ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ sarve eva guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ

original: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathājātīyānāṃ sarveṣāmevoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvam ca teṣām tathājātīyānām sarveṣām eva ukta anuktānām sāmānyam

original: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite locanam hyetadupamāyāṃ spaṣṭenābhidhāprakāreṇaiva /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇe sarve eva ete locanam hi etat upamāyām spaṣṭena abhidhā prakāreṇa eva
tathājātīyānām iti
cāru tva atiśayavatām iti arthaḥ

original: sulakṣitā iti yatkilaiṣāṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ na tatkāvye 'bhyarthanīyam /
analyzed: su lakṣitāḥ iti yat kila eṣām tad vinirmuktam rūpam na tat kāvye bhyarthanīyam
upamā hi yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti
rūpakam khalevālī yūpaḥ iti
śleṣaḥ dvirvacane ci iti tantra ātmakaḥ
yathāsaṃkhyam tudīśālā turā iti
dīpakam gām aśvam iti
sa sandehaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā syāt iti
apahnutiḥ na idam rajatam iti
paryāya uktam paunaḥ divā an ātti iti
tulya yogitā sthā dhvoḥ i t caḥ iti

original: aprastutapraśaṃsā sarvāṇi jñāpakāni yathā padasaṃjñāyāmantavacanam--'anyatra saṃjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhirna' iti /
analyzed: aprastuta praśaṃsā sarvāṇi jñāpakāni yathā pada saṃjñāyām anta vacanam anyatra saṃjñā vidhau pratyaya grahaṇe tad anta vidhiḥ na iti

original: ākṣepaścobhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpātmakaviśeṣābhidhitsayā iṣṭasyāpi vidheḥ pūrvaṃ niṣedhanātpratiṣedhena bālapriyā atra hetundarśayannāha---sādhāraṇetyādi
analyzed: ākṣepaḥ ca ubhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpa ātmaka viśeṣa abhidhitsayā iṣṭasya api vidheḥ pūrvam niṣedhanāt pratiṣedhena bālapriyāḥ atra hetun darśayan āha sādhāraṇa ityādi
etat upamāyām iti
mālopamāyām iti arthaḥ
abhidhā prakāreṇa abhidhā vyāpāreṇa
eva kāreṇa vyañjanasya vyavacchedaḥ
ayam arthaḥ atra upamāyām apekṣitaḥ dharmaḥ pūta tva ādiḥ tayā ityādinā spaṣṭam abhidhīyate
na punar dīpaka abhiprāyeṇa dīpa sthānīyaḥ rthaḥ
prabhā mahatyā śikhayā dīpaḥ iva tayā
sa pūtaḥ ca ityādi vākya artha trayasya bodhaḥ hi ādau jāyate
tad uttaram tu pūta tva vibhūṣita tvayoḥ dīpa ādi upamāna traya himavat upameya ātmaka aneka anugamaḥ vagamyate iti dīpakam atra vyaṅgya tayā anupraviṣṭam iti

original: mālopamātiriktopāttadharmakopamāsthale tu dharmasyobhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭamabhidhīyata iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgyatayānupraveśa iti mālopametyuktam
analyzed: mālopamā atirikta upātta dharmaka upamā sthale tu dharmasya ubhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭam abhidhīyate iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgya tayā anupraveśaḥ iti mālopamā iti uktam
tathā jātīnām iti atra jāti śabdaḥ prakṛte cārutva atiśaya yogitva rūpa upādhi vacanaḥ iti āha cārutva iti
nanu anyaḥ eva guṇībhūta vyaṅgya prakāraḥ

original: anye copamādayo 'laṅkārāstatkathaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇe kṛte teṣāṃ lakṣitatvasiddhirityato 'bhiprāyamudbhedayannāha--yatkiletyādi /
analyzed: anye ca upamā ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ tat katham guṇībhūta vyaṅgya lakṣaṇe kṛte teṣām lakṣita tva siddhiḥ iti atas bhiprāyam udbhedayan āha yat kila ityādi
eṣām iti
upamā ādīnām iti arthaḥ
tad vinirmuktam guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā virahitam
na abhyarthanīyam iti
alaṅkāra tāyām anupayogi tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
ukta upapādanāya āha aupamā hi ityādi
dvirvacane ci iti
sūtre smin dvirvacana śabdaḥ rtha dvaya paraḥ
tudi iti
tudīśāla ityādi sūtre hi yathāsaṅkhyena sambandhaḥ
gām aśvam iti atra eka kriyayā sa bodhyaḥ
sthā dhvoḥ iti
anena sūtreṇa dvayoḥ ekam vidhīyate
sarvāṇi jñāpakāni iti
tad tad paribhāṣā ādayaḥ sūtra stha tad tad padena gamyan ye iti bhāvaḥ
na iti ita
jñāpayati iti śeṣaḥ
ubhayatra su lakṣitāḥ bhavanti

original: ekaikasya svarūpaviśeṣakathanena tu sāmānyalakṣaṇarahitena pratipādapāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum, ānantyāt /
analyzed: ekaikasya svarūpa viśeṣa kathanena tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa rahitena pratipāda pāṭhena iva śabdāḥ na śakyante tattvataḥ nirjñātum ānantyāt
anantāḥ hi vāc vikalpāḥ tad prakārāḥ eva ca alaṅkārāḥ
locanam samīkṛta iti nyāyāt
atiśayoktiḥ samudraḥ kuṇḍikāḥ vindhyaḥ vardhitavān arka vartmā agṛhṇāt iti
evam anyat
na ca evamādi

original: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataivātrālaṅkāratāyāṃ marmabhūtā lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā eva atra alaṅkāra tāyām marma bhūtāḥ lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati

original: yayā supūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti,
analyzed: yayā su pūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītāḥ bhavanti
anyathā tu avaśyam avyāptiḥ bhavet
tat āha ekaikasya iti
na ca atiśayokti vakrokti upamā ādīnām sāmānya rūpa tvam cāru tā hīnānām upapadyate
cāru tā ca etad āyattā iti etat eva guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvam sāmānya lakṣaṇam
vyaṅgyasya ca cāru tvam rasa abhivyakti yogyatā ātmakam

original: rasasya svātmanaiva viśrāntidhāmna ānandātmakatvamiti nānavasthā kāciditi tātparyam /
analyzed: rasasya sva ātmanā eva viśrānti dhāmnaḥ ānanda ātmaka tvam iti na anavasthā kācid iti tātparyam
anantāḥ hi iti
prathama uddyote eva vyākhyātam etat vāc vikalpānām ānantyāt iti atra antare
nanu sarveṣu alaṅkāreṣu na alaṅkāra antaram vyaṅgyam cakāsti
tat katham guṇībhūta vyaṅgyena bālapriya vibhāṣāsu ityādi
spaṣṭam idam vaiyākaraṇānām
samudaḥ kuṇḍikā iti

original: jalabāhulyapradarśanāya kuṇḍikāṃ viṣayīkṛtya samudra iti nirdeśādbhede abhedarūpātiśayoktiriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: jala bāhulya pradarśanāya kuṇḍikām viṣayīkṛtya samudraḥ iti nirdeśāt bhede abheda rūpa atiśayoktiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vindhyaḥ ityādau asambandhe sambandha rūpā sā
upasaṃharan āha evam anyat ityādi
evamādi iti
ukta udāharaṇa ādikam iti arthaḥ
iti iti hetau

original: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavantītyetasya vivaraṇam--guṇībhūtetyādi /

original: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati,
analyzed: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokya sāra bhūtasya yaḥ evam karoti surata kṛtām glānim tāntim harati

original: atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /
analyzed: atha ca tad viṣayām glānim punar sambhoga abhilāṣa uddīpanena harati

original: na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca /
analyzed: na ca prasahya prabhuta tayā api tu aṅga anukūlaḥ hi adya sparśaḥ hṛdaya antarbhūtaḥ ca
priyatame tad viṣaye prārthanā artham cāṭūni kārayati
priyatamaḥ pi tad pavana sparśa prabuddha sambhoga abhilāṣaḥ

original: prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /
analyzed: prārthanā artham cāṭūni karoti iti tena tathā kāryate iti sau pavanaḥ

original: yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha--nayaneti /
analyzed: yuktam ca etat tasya yatas sau vātaḥ iti nāgarikaḥ na tu avidagdhaḥ bālapriyā bhāva artham āha nayana iti
maitrī pada mukhya arthasya atra bādhāt tad padena vivakṣitam darśayati abhyāsaṅga ityādi
abhyāsaṅgasya saṃśleṣasya aviyogaḥ vicchedaḥ avicchinnaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ iti yāvat

original: tena parasparānukūlyasya parasparopakāritvasya lābha ityartha-. atrāvicchinnassaṃśleṣo lakṣyārthaḥ,
analyzed: tena paraspara ānukūlyasya paraspara upakāri tvasya lābhaḥ iti artha atra avicchinnaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ lakṣya arthaḥ

original: cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /

original: 'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ

tathā idam vyākhyānam iti bhāvaḥ
āsūtritānām iti

original: āsūtritānāṃ bhedānāṃ samyaksūtrairnirdiṣṭānāṃ dhvanyādibhedarūpāṇāṃ kāvyavāṇīnāṃ yā sphuṭatāpattiḥ /
analyzed: āsūtritānām bhedānām samyak sūtraiḥ nirdiṣṭānām dhvani ādi bheda rūpāṇām kāvya vāṇīnām yā sphuṭa tā āpattiḥ
sphuṭa tva prāptiḥ tad dāyinīm
madhyamā hi vaikharyāḥ sphuṭa tvam dadāti
madhyamām iti
madhyamā rūpām iti arthaḥ

original: śubhamastu sarvaṃ śivam iti śrīrāmaśārakaracitāyāṃ locanaṭippaṇyāṃ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
analyzed: śubham astu sarvam śivam iti śrī rāmaśāraka racitāyām locanaṭippaṇyām tṛtīyaḥ uddyotaḥ
